column2: When a filter is set to §Y"INCLUDED"§!, that type of artifact will be §Yincluded§! in all searches for the §Y"CSH-Q"§! traits in the Character Finder. Similarly, if a filter is set to §Y"EXCLUDED"§!, that type of artifact will be §Yexcluded§! from all searches.\n\nNB: §Y"CSH-MaxQ"§! traits are §Ynot impacted§! by artifact filters, due to processing constraints.
Has at least one §Y(CSH) artifact filter§! set to §Y"EXCLUDED"§!
Has ALL §Y(CSH) artifact filter§! set to §Y"INCLUDED"§!
Has ALL §Y(CSH) artifact filter§! set to §Y"EXCLUDED"§!
Has at least one §Y(CSH) artifact filter§! set to §Y"INCLUDED"§!
All §Y(CSH) artifact filters§! are set to §G"INCLUDED"§!
All §Y(CSH) artifact filters§! are set to §R"EXCLUDED"§!
All §Y(CSH) artifact filters§! are inverted.\n(§Y"INCLUDED"§! changes to §R"EXCLUDED"§!, §Y"EXCLUDED"§! changes to §G"INCLUDED"§!.)
